main.name: Kiley Carson
main.contactmessage: If anything on my resume interested you, please feel free to contact me via email or LinkedIn.
main.bio1: Kiley Carson is a results-driven professional known for her dedication, perseverance, and self-described status as an eternal learner. With a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from the University of Calgary and a perfect GPA of 4.0 from the Yale School of Management's Womenâ€™s Leadership Program, Kiley possesses a diverse skill set and a passion for technology and leadership. Currently serving as an Identity Development Manager at ATB Financial, she excels in collaborating with cross-functional teams to implement secure identity and access management solutions.
main.bio2: Throughout her career, Kiley has showcased her resilience in overcoming challenges and fostering inclusive work environments. Her roles at ATB Financial, including CIAM Security Developer and Apigee Full-Stack Developer, underscore her critical . As a co-organizer of the Google Developer Group (GDG) Calgary Cloud and founder of the University of Calgary Developer Student Club, she advocates for empowering women and underrepresented groups in technology.
main.bio3: Recipient of esteemed scholarships and awards such as the Lockhart Family Scholarship for Computer Science and the Women Techmakers Scholars Program Award, Kiley remains steadfast in her pursuit of excellence. With an unwavering focus on tangible results and a lifelong commitment to learning, Kiley Carson endeavors to be a trailblazer in technology and leadership.
main.resumeRequest: Please reach out directly to receive the code for the resume.

education.description: This web-based leadership program aims to empower women leaders, whether they are already in a leadership position or aspiring to become one. The course is designed to support business leaders and senior managers in understanding how their behaviors can influence their organizations' future while equipping them with leadership skills to create positive changes.

education.degree: Honors Bachelor of Science, Computer Science
education.description: Graduated with a First Class Honours Bachelor of Science in Computer Science. Degree was completed with a concentration in Information Security and a minor in Management and Society. My honors research project was an analysis of the FIDO2 authentication system, it's cryptographic building blocks, security model and proof.
